If the user wants horror movies, then I would recommend the movie "Saw". 

" Saw" is a well-known horror film that follows the story of two people who are trapped in an amusement park and must fight for their lives. 

The movie is known for its intense and suspenseful storyline, as well as its graphic violence and disturbing imagery. 

Overall, if the user wants horror movies, then I would recommend the movie "Saw".
